name: Moley's Puzzle
description:
Note:

Make sure you click to focus the game window before playing (seems to be an issue with iframes). Also if the games runs too slow try disabling the starfield by pressing F1. There was also a minor bug where you could move up the walls (this is now fixed).

Game Description

You play a mole and other characters in a fully rotating environment. The main objective is to get the key and proceed to the door to exit the level using methods such as rotation and jumping. You may also have to collect some jewels along the way.
